nodes.text: Chicago followed a similar course. In the decade after it outlawed handguns, murders jumped by 41 percent, compared with an 18 percent rise in the entire United States.
So let's see these statistics to prove that hundreds were saved. For issues in Chicago, I'd trust a source that's actually from Chicago sooner than I'd trust CNN.

First you say that gun bans are Constitutional. When it's proven that gun bans are unconstitutional, you say 'f*** the Constitution.' Leftism at its finest. Chicago’s handgun ban failure - chicagotribune.com  So let's see these statistics to prove that hundreds were saved. For issues in Chicago, I'd trust a source that's actually from Chicago sooner than I'd trust CNN.
I wish you guys would quit trying to 'muddy the waters' by introducing facts that contradict my claims, innuendo, cliches and WAG. - signed X gazer
and gun nuts say f*** the children when we have to decide between saving guns and childrens lives
then why in the world can't guns be regulated to protect against murder?
Because murder's already illegal and there's nothing more that can be done about it.
The way I see it- if government can regulate free speech to protect people againt things like obscenity and libel
Actually they can't. The government doesn't have the authority to tell people they can't curse in public.

The way I see it- if government can regulate free speech to protect people againt things like obscenity and libel then why in the world can't guns be regulated to protect against murder? Of course don't expect any of the radicals here to understand.... :xbanghead
